metadata.description: Decomposition Phase Plan - 85 micro-tasks organized as a DAG for MathLedger integration

merge_points.basis_wave1: Foundation tasks required for First Organism happy-path

PHASE_CLASSIFICATION_NOTICE.disclaimer: Phase I vs Phase II Classification (2025-11-30)
PHASE_CLASSIFICATION_NOTICE.phase_i_definition: Tasks completed and backed by actual sealed evidence (attestation.json, fo_baseline/fo_rfl logs, dyno charts)
PHASE_CLASSIFICATION_NOTICE.phase_ii_definition: Tasks NOT YET IMPLEMENTED - future work including: ΔH scaling, imperfect verifier theory, wave-1 basis promotion, MDAP micro-agents, Lean sandbox, wide slice theory curves, logistic abstention theory

PHASE_I_RFL_EVIDENCE_STATUS.summary: Both RFL log files are Phase I evidence. Neither demonstrates RFL uplift.

fo_rfl_50_jsonl.note: Demonstrates RFL execution, NOT uplift. All cycles show abstention.

fo_rfl_jsonl.note: Extended run, all-abstain. Confirms RFL loop mechanics, NOT uplift.

PHASE_I_RFL_EVIDENCE_STATUS.critical_clarification: These logs prove RFL code path executes. They do NOT prove RFL improves derivation. Any claim of 'RFL uplift' requires Phase II experiments not yet run.
PHASE_I_RFL_EVIDENCE_STATUS.constraint: No Phase II task may implicitly depend on RFL uplift data from these logs.

phase_ii_deferred_categories: All CURR-* tasks (curriculum/wide slice theory) — Not activated by current RFL logs.
RFL-004, RFL-006 (RFL scaling theory) — Not activated by current RFL logs.
DET-005 (replay capability) — Not activated by current RFL logs.
All SEC-001, SEC-002 (token rotation, request signing) — Not activated by current RFL logs.
All DOC-* except DOC-007 (architecture docs for unbuilt systems) — Not activated by current RFL logs.
TYPE-003, TYPE-004 (mypy for Phase II code) — Not activated by current RFL logs.
PHASE_CLASSIFICATION_NOTICE.phase_ii_constraint: Not activated by current RFL logs. No Phase II task may claim RFL uplift as evidence.

PHASE_II_RFL_UPLIFT_ROADMAP.description: Future Phase II tasks for RFL uplift experiments. These are NOT started and require governance gate approval.

preconditions.phase_i_sealed: Evidence Pack v1 must be sealed before any uplift experiment
preconditions.negative_control_acknowledged: Phase I logs (fo_rfl_50.jsonl, fo_rfl.jsonl) establish negative control baseline — all-abstain, no uplift demonstrated
preconditions.new_experiments_required: Uplift claims require NEW experiments, not reinterpretation of Phase I logs

tasks.title: Design non-degenerate uplift slice configuration
tasks.description: Design a curriculum slice where RFL has opportunity to demonstrate measurable improvement over baseline. Must define success criteria before running.
tasks.phase_i_reference: Phase I fo_rfl_50.jsonl showed 100% abstention — this task must design conditions where abstention < 100% is achievable
tasks.not_allowed: Re-using Phase I logs as uplift evidence

tasks.title: Run controlled uplift experiment (baseline vs RFL)
tasks.description: Execute paired baseline and RFL runs on the non-degenerate slice. Minimum 1000 cycles each. Record all metrics.
tasks.phase_i_reference: Must produce NEW log files, not reinterpret fo_rfl_50.jsonl or fo_rfl.jsonl
tasks.not_allowed: Claiming Phase I logs demonstrate uplift

tasks.title: Analyze uplift results with statistical rigor
tasks.description: Compare baseline vs RFL on derivation count, abstention rate, and ΔH metrics. Apply bootstrap CI. Report effect size.
tasks.phase_i_reference: Phase I established negative control (no uplift). This analysis must show statistically significant improvement or report null result.
tasks.not_allowed: Cherry-picking metrics, p-hacking, or retrospective hypothesis adjustment

tasks.title: Document uplift findings (positive or null)
tasks.description: Write up findings regardless of outcome. Null results are valid scientific contributions.
tasks.phase_i_reference: Must clearly state that Phase I showed no uplift, and whether Phase II changed that assessment
tasks.not_allowed: Overclaiming, hiding null results, or conflating Phase I with Phase II evidence

tasks.title: Integrate uplift evidence into Evidence Pack v2 (if positive)
tasks.description: If UPLIFT-003 shows positive results, seal new evidence into Evidence Pack v2. If null, document as such.
tasks.phase_i_reference: Evidence Pack v1 remains unchanged regardless of Phase II outcome

interlock_with_existing_categories.CURR: Curriculum slice design (UPLIFT-001) may inform CURR-001 through CURR-006, but those remain Phase II until uplift is demonstrated
interlock_with_existing_categories.RFL: RFL-004 (determinism verification) and RFL-006 (bootstrap stats) become relevant only after UPLIFT-002 produces non-degenerate logs
interlock_with_existing_categories.DET: DET-005 (replay capability) useful for reproducing uplift experiments but not required for initial run
interlock_with_existing_categories.DOC: DOC-* tasks documenting uplift theory remain deferred until UPLIFT-004 completes

phase_transition_rules.rule_1: No Phase II uplift task may begin until Evidence Pack v1 is sealed
phase_transition_rules.rule_2: No Phase II task may reinterpret Phase I logs as uplift evidence
phase_transition_rules.rule_3: All uplift claims require new experiments with pre-registered success criteria
phase_transition_rules.rule_4: Null results must be documented with same rigor as positive results
phase_transition_rules.rule_5: Phase I documents remain frozen — Phase II creates new documents, does not edit Phase I

PHASE_II_UPLIFT_WORK_BREAKDOWN.notice: PHASE II — NOT RUN IN PHASE I
PHASE_II_UPLIFT_WORK_BREAKDOWN.description: Complete work breakdown structure for Phase II uplift experiments implementing asymmetric environments, U2 runner, slice-specific success metrics, and evidence pack integration.

tasks.title: Consolidate DOMAIN_* constants in substrate.crypto.hashing

tasks.title: Implement Phase II curriculum loader
tasks.description: Create CurriculumLoaderV2 that reads curriculum_uplift_phase2.yaml and provides slice configurations for the four asymmetric environments (goal, sparse, tree, dependency). Must validate slice parameters against schema and expose slice_params, success_metric, and budget constraints.
acceptance_criteria: Loads all 4 Phase II slices from curriculum_uplift_phase2.yaml
Validates required fields: atoms, depth_min, depth_max, breadth_max, total_max
Returns SliceConfig dataclass with all parameters
Unit tests pass for each slice type

tasks.title: Add slice parameter validation and schema enforcement
tasks.description: Extend CurriculumLoaderV2 with strict schema validation using Pydantic models. Ensure all Phase II slices have required fields and valid ranges. Add validation for success_metric.kind matching expected values.
acceptance_criteria: Pydantic models for SliceParams, SuccessMetric, UpliftExpectation, Gates
Integration test with actual curriculum_uplift_phase2.yaml passes

tasks.title: Implement slice enumeration and selection API
tasks.description: Add list_slices(), get_slice(name), and get_all_phase2_slices() methods to CurriculumLoaderV2. Enable filtering by success_metric.kind and phase.
acceptance_criteria: list_slices() returns list of slice names
get_slice(name) returns SliceConfig or raises KeyError

tasks.title: Implement goal_hit success metric evaluator
tasks.description: Create SuccessEvaluatorGoalHit that determines cycle success based on whether target formula hashes were proven. Implements the goal_hit metric from PREREG_UPLIFT_U2.yaml with min_goal_hits and min_total_verified thresholds.
acceptance_criteria: SuccessResult contains: success (bool), goal_hits (int), total_verified (int), details (dict)
Returns success=True iff goal_hits >= min_goal_hits AND total_verified >= min_total_verified
Unit tests with mock cycle results

tasks.title: Implement density success metric evaluator
tasks.description: Create SuccessEvaluatorDensity that measures verification efficiency. Success defined as verifying >= min_verified proofs within max_candidates attempts. Used by slice_uplift_sparse.

tasks.title: Implement chain_length success metric evaluator
tasks.description: Create SuccessEvaluatorChainLength that measures derivation chain depth. Success requires proving a formula with derivation chain >= min_chain_length steps from axioms. Used by slice_uplift_tree.
acceptance_criteria: evaluate(cycle_results, config) returns SuccessResult with max_chain_length
Computes derivation chain length via parent traversal
Integration test with actual proof DAG

tasks.title: Implement multi_goal success metric evaluator
tasks.description: Create SuccessEvaluatorMultiGoal that requires all specified goal formulas to be proven in the same cycle. Success only if every hash in required_goal_hashes has >= min_each_goal proofs. Used by slice_uplift_dependency.
acceptance_criteria: evaluate(cycle_results, config) returns SuccessResult with goals_hit dict
Success = all goals have hits >= min_each_goal
Unit tests with partial and complete goal satisfaction

tasks.title: Create SuccessEvaluatorFactory and registry
tasks.description: Implement factory pattern to instantiate appropriate evaluator based on success_metric.kind. Register all four evaluators. Enable extensibility for future metric types.
acceptance_criteria: Registry allows adding new evaluator types
Integration test with each slice config

tasks.title: Implement run_uplift_u2.py core runner
tasks.description: Create the U2 experiment runner that executes paired baseline/RFL runs on all four Phase II slices. Uses CurriculumLoaderV2 for slice configs and SuccessEvaluatorFactory for per-cycle success evaluation. Follows PREREG_UPLIFT_U2.yaml protocol.
acceptance_criteria: Runs baseline mode with random_shuffle candidate ordering
Runs RFL mode with policy_score candidate ordering
Logs cycle-level success metrics to JSONL

tasks.title: Add deterministic seeding and reproducibility to U2 runner
tasks.description: Ensure U2 runner produces identical results given same seed. Implement MDAP_SEED + cycle_index schedule. Add replay verification to manifest.
acceptance_criteria: Same seed produces identical baseline logs
Same seed produces identical RFL logs
Replay test runs 10 cycles twice, verifies bit-identical output
No non-deterministic timestamp/UUID leakage in results

tasks.title: Add per-slice telemetry and cycle logging
tasks.description: Extend U2 runner with detailed telemetry: candidates_tried, verified_count, success_metric_result, timing_ms, policy_scores (RFL only). Write to per-cycle JSONL with consistent schema.
acceptance_criteria: JSONL schema: {cycle, mode, slice, candidates_tried, verified, success, metric_details, timing_ms}
Telemetry hook integration for external monitoring

tasks.title: Implement chain-depth analyzer for tree slice diagnostics
tasks.description: Create ChainDepthAnalyzer that computes derivation chain statistics: max_depth, mean_depth, depth_histogram, deepest_formulas. Used for slice_uplift_tree success evaluation and post-hoc analysis.
acceptance_criteria: ChainDepthStats contains: max_depth, mean_depth, depth_histogram, deepest_n
Efficient BFS/DFS traversal for large DAGs
Handles cyclic DAG gracefully (error, not infinite loop)

tasks.title: Implement slice diagnostics dashboard data generator
tasks.description: Create SliceDiagnostics class that aggregates per-cycle metrics into slice-level summaries: success_rate, mean_verified, p95_timing, abstention_rate. Output JSON for dashboard consumption.
acceptance_criteria: Generates comparison table: baseline vs RFL

tasks.title: Implement U2 statistical summary generator
tasks.description: Create StatisticalSummaryU2 that computes primary and secondary metrics per PREREG_UPLIFT_U2.yaml: success_rate with Wilson CI, Δp with bootstrap CI, two-proportion z-test or bootstrap comparison. Outputs statistical_summary.json.
acceptance_criteria: Primary metric: success_rate per mode with 95% Wilson CI
Computes Δp = p_rfl - p_base with bootstrap CI

tasks.title: Implement CI harness for U2 experiment validation
tasks.description: Create pytest-based CI harness that validates U2 experiments: manifest schema compliance, log file integrity, statistical summary completeness, preregistration hash verification.
acceptance_criteria: test_log_files_exist() verifies baseline.jsonl and rfl.jsonl present
test_prereg_hash_matches() verifies preregistration not modified post-run

tasks.title: Add governance gate validation to U2 runner
tasks.description: Extend U2 runner to check VSD_PHASE_2_uplift_gate conditions before execution. Verify Evidence Pack v1 sealed, Phase I logs not referenced, preregistration document exists.
acceptance_criteria: Runner checks for uplift_gate.json or environment variable
Validates PREREG_UPLIFT_U2.yaml exists and is not modified
Refuses to run if Phase I logs would be overwritten
Clear error messages for gate violations

tasks.title: Design Evidence Pack v2 structure
tasks.description: Design directory structure and manifest schema for Evidence Pack v2 containing Phase II uplift results. Define attestation format, artifact checksums, and cross-references to Phase I pack.
acceptance_criteria: Schema includes: manifest.json, per-slice results, statistical_summary.json
Cross-reference to Evidence Pack v1 without modification
Attestation format for Phase II results

tasks.title: Implement Evidence Pack v2 builder
tasks.description: Create EvidencePackV2Builder that assembles Phase II artifacts into the Evidence Pack v2 structure. Computes checksums, validates completeness, generates attestation file.
acceptance_criteria: build(experiment_dir, output_dir) creates Evidence Pack v2
Copies and checksums all required artifacts
Generates manifest.json with file list and hashes

tasks.title: Add Phase II outcome documentation template
tasks.description: Create template for documenting Phase II uplift findings (UPLIFT_FINDINGS.md). Template covers positive results, null results, or mixed results. Includes sections for methodology, results, interpretation, and next steps.
acceptance_criteria: Sections: Executive Summary, Methodology, Per-Slice Results, Statistical Analysis, Interpretation, Limitations, Next Steps
Examples for positive and null result scenarios

tasks.title: Implement analyze_uplift_u2.py post-run analyzer
tasks.description: Create analyzer script that reads U2 experiment results and generates statistical summary, diagnostic visualizations, and populates Evidence Pack v2. Analogous to analyze_uplift_u1.py but for Phase II.
